item.description:
This month we will be hosting Katherine Miller. Katherine has been a student of Andrew Cohen for fifteen years. She resides at the EnlightenNext World Center in Lenox, Massachusetts where she is the primary coordinator of the EnlightenNext Residential Work/Study Program. She has done extensive periods of retreat practice and is one of the Enlightened Communication Group Leaders, facilitating public discussions at the EnlightenNext Centers in Lenox, New York, and Boston. She will be facilitating a
discussion where everyone can engage together in the principal ideas and themes
of the latest issue on Utopia, as well as get an overview of the featured articles.

Who is Katherine Miller? Check her out at:

http://www.eecourse.o...
item.name: Boston Ken Wilber Group May Meetup
